quality_assessment: Page has accurate core content but contains outdated default values and storage configuration details that differ from implementation

issues.description: Default value documented as 1, but actual default in code is 4
issues.fix_suggestion: Update the default value from 1 to 4 to match ProdigyConfig::default()

issues.description: Storage configuration fields don't match actual ProdigyConfig structure - docs show backend_config.base_dir and backend_config.repository_grouping but code has base_path and compression_level
issues.should_be: base_path and compression_level fields at storage level
issues.fix_suggestion: Update storage configuration example to show correct field structure: storage.backend, storage.base_path, storage.compression_level

issues.description: compression_level field (0-9) is documented in ProdigyConfig but not shown in global config documentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add documentation for storage.compression_level field with range 0-9 and default 0

issues.description: Storage backend types documented as 'file' or 'memory' but actual values serialized as 'filesystem' and 'memory'
issues.fix_suggestion: Update backend type value from 'file' to 'filesystem' to match serde serialization
